Text: Why in God's name do you upload these books in .mobi format which nobody knows about.Why not .pdf format.How wonderful it would have been to read all these books you have uploaded on these notorious serial killers!

right, it's an annoying file type. You can convert on this site: http://www.convertfiles.com/ You just fill in the form, then upload the .mobi and download the result. Warning: the conversion to pdf is not perfect, as text the result is better
